titles.title: O Love divine, by Christ revealed

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Love divine, by Christ revealed, Incarnate Love that died for me, To Thee myself I gladly yield, I consecrate my all to Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O Light divine, by Christ displayed, Source of all light, who flesh became, Shed Thy bright beams upon my head, Burn in my heart a constant flame.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O Truth divine, by Christ made known, All truth must Thy reflection be; Within my heart set up Thy throne, And in Thy freedom make me free.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O Cross divine, by Christ endured, Thou cross on which He groaned and died, And manâ€™s redemption thus secured, In Thy blest shadow let me hide.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: O Peace divine, by Christ bestowed, Thy heavenly dove to earth come down, May He within make His abode, My life with His dear presence crown.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: O Joy divine, by Christ possessed, For which He did the cross endure, Fill with Thyself and make me blest, Contented, restful and secure.
